#summary The application used for previewing DyKnow files.

http://lh3.ggpht.com/_l4Rv5VGKzLQ/S_AH2w6LmAI/AAAAAAAAAbU/eOc9PRFWSew/s400/DPXPreview.png

= Introduction =
DPXPreview is able to read in a DyKnow file and display the contents of each panel in an InkCanvas.

= Details =
  * Reads in the contents of a DyKnow file including the background image and ink strokes
  * Currently not able to read in elements such as text and shapes
  * Can export the rendered version of the InkCanvas as an image
